channel.title: Comments on: What Can You Learn from Scammy-looking Clickbank Sales Pages?
channel.description: Steal the Secrets of the Best Marketers on the Internet by Studying Their Landing Pages

item.title: By: Big Jon
item.dc:creator: Big Jon
item.description: Awesome article, very helpful since I'm trying to be a successful vendor on ClickBank. I'm making sure not to do these mistakes and will see what I can do to implement the DO's.
item.content:encoded: Awesome article, very helpful since I’m trying to be a successful vendor on ClickBank. I’m making sure not to do these mistakes and will see what I can do to implement the DO’s.
